eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: manually processed data, employment verification, education verification, criminal records
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Background Profiles will cooperate with any data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives (i.e. regarding human resources data). We also utilize Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor program (i.e. regarding all other types of data).
